text: "Bad Boys" is a song by Australian band Roxus. The song was released in July 1991 as the second single from their debut studio album Nightstreet (1991). The song peaked at number 39 on the Australian ARIA Chart. ==Track listing== ; Vinyl / 7" single (K11016) # "Bad Boys" - 2:57 # "Bad Boys" (Live) - 2:40 # "All Right Now" (Live) - 5:13 ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !scope="col"| Chart (1991) !scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== * "Bad Boys" by Roxus Category:1991 singles Category:1991 songs Category:Roxus songs Category:Song recordings produced by Mark Opitz
title: Bad Boys (Roxus song)
